data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The NAACP Legal Defense and Education Fund is a legal organization in the United States. It's ____ to ____ mission ____ protecting ____ preserving ____ rights. In ____, ____ focuses ____ efforts ____ minority ____ in ____ society. It has also had a hand in human rights campaigns internationally over the past several decades.
data.partBlankContent: The NAACP Legal Defense and Education Fund is a legal organization in the United States. It's dedi_____ to t__ mission o_ protecting a__ preserving ci___ rights. In parti_____, i_ focuses i__ efforts o_ minority gro___ in Amer____ society. It has also had a hand in human rights campaigns internationally over the past several decades.
data.answer: NAACP法律辩护和教育基金是美国的一个合法组织。它致力于保护和维护公民权利。特别地，它把它的努力集中在美国社会的少数群体上。在过去几十年里，它还参与了国际人权运动。
